nodes.text: Tee-muss were a species of domesticated farm animals native to the jungle planet Onderon. They were located on various worlds around the galaxy—such as Balnab, Felucia, and Florrum—because of domestication purposes or to serve as mounts.
They had a short proboscis and two tusks on their lower jaw. Their ears were long and normally bent and pointed outward, when the tee-muss was attacked or threatened, they pointed downward.

Casiss' farming community used several as pack animals and mounts. The tee-muss laid down for the rider to mount. The farmers later rode tee-musses in a battle against Hondo Ohnaka's gang to defend their Nysillin crop from the Weequay pirate.
